Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2021
Author: Leanetta
Title: Fuzz forever. Do not buy!
Body: Do not buy these towels! They are beautiful and fluffy and soft. AND, they never stop shedding. I have added pictures. This was the third time washing and drying them. They left that much lint in the washer 3rd time. FYI Lint will also be on your next load of clothes. The floor picture is the lint that fell as is was folding them after drying for the 3rd time. Note the penny to see the size of the fuzz. That doesn't count the fuzz that drifted into corners and the other room. The final picture is the how amount of lint in the dryer tray.  Notice the thickness of the lint. I had to remove the lint filter and use a vacuum tool to get what was stuck in the dryer under the lint filter.  I have fuzz all over my body from folding them. I cannot imagine using these after bathing. You would be in a naked, fuzzy nightmare.
Style: Size: 6 Pieces Towel Set | Color: Navy Blue

Title: Avoid these
Body: I love how it says you can get a full refund IF the product is unused. After first wash I could already see strings coming loose from the towels and after my first use I had towl fibers ALL OVER my body. I had to get back in and prewash because of how covered I was, then use one of my older towls. I don't think these are Turkish cotton, they way they fall apart after wash and ball up after use suggests low quality material. What's worse is I can't return them because I've used them (how else am I to know if they work well???). Awful purchase, just avoid these towls. The only good thing about them is that they ARE soft, which is the only truthful thing about the description provided.

I realised the next day after bathing that the green towel has totally turned yellow overnight. If I knew how cheap the material was, I wouldn't have wasted $30 for no reason..The green towel turned yellow overnight after my first bath. Waste of money. I wish I could return this but I used it before realizing the junk I bought. Check the pictures.. Title: luxury,
Body: These towels exceeded my expectations. They are quick-dry, light weight and the cotton quality has super absorbency when drying the body. I have experienced in the past different towels that no matter how many times they are washed, they are still looks like new. These towels did not and certainly performed above my expectations. In fact, I had only bought one set and upon receiving, I realized that I should have purchase more. I wouldn't hesitate to buy again and when I need my towels replenished, these will be my go to. Also, they wash and dry well; no fading of color and towels feel even more soft and fluffy after drying. I purchased the gray.

Title: Bee prepared for shedding

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2019
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠êSUPER TOWELS
Body: ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠êWOWZA!!These towels are SUPER SOFT WITHOUT fabric softener!!I washed them as directed as soon as they arrived, ran them in the dryer and have been using these ever since. So ABSORBENT. It's funny how fast they dry you off. I never realized how bad my other towels were until I gave these a shot!They get softer with use and washings. Don't let the way they feel when they first arrive fool you! At first, I thought I had made a mistake ordering these. Lol ..Definitely ORDER THESE!I will be ordering more to replace all the other towels we have!!!
Style: Size: 6 Pieces Towel Set | Color: Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2020
Author: JK
Title: Comparable to Major Department Stores
Body: So far so good. They seem accurate as far as the description as such and other reviewers that I have purchased.  They wash well and seem pretty soft so far, brand I'd compare to "the big one " type of towels like Kohls.  I'd say it's a pretty good deal for how many towels come in the set. Time will tell if they hold up in a household of 4 people.  I ordered a set of be light green mint or a "softer color of teal" my 10 year old says and the yellow is very vibrant which I love and equally as soft. I will know better how they both function in comparison to one another as I've noticed per the reviews both of the quality of them depend on the color you get.Updated- 09/24/20The yellow set is like some reviews I've read about leaving some fuzz balls behind. I used them after washing them and kinda annoyed that I had to jump back in the shower to rinse off again. I washed the yellow towels 2 additional times and no leftover fuzzies. I did use about 6 dryer sheets the third time to see if that would help the cause and can't confirm that soley took away the fuzz but haven't had my orginal problem sense the 3rd time.  Just remember not to be surprised that your lint catcher the 1st time you dry them will be very lush with a layer of whatever is coming off the towels.I did not have the same problem with the light green mint type towels which is strange but overall was a good deal with saving on the "lighting deal" they offered.Don't just throw away the package upon receiving the towels. My package had a buisness card text offered to received 2 hand towels for free with confirmation of my order number & review. It was all legit like the card said and received them very quickly. I only received 2 free hand towels (in mint color)as there was no option choose from on which color you preferred. Not clear if it's just one offer per order but I received each set in separate packages with the free offer card but purchased both at the same time. I've reached out to seller to clarify this information, regardless I'm still happy with my purchase and wish more sellers offered free items like they do because who doesn't appreciate 2 free items. I will purchase more when the time comes. Thank you !
Style: Size: 6 Pieces Towel Set | Color: Green

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2018

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2020
Author: Barb B.
Title: Left lint everywhere, even after 3 washes
Body: These towels had so much lint and left red fuzz everywhere. All over the washer and dryer, the bathroom, the floor. The pictures I took are after the third time washing them, because unless you like being covered in damp red lint, they were unusable after the first wash. They still have tons of lint after 3 washes. They are soft, but not very absorbent. They're also kind of small and thin, and the border looks pretty but makes them even smaller for drying surface area. I honestly regret not shopping around more, but the reviews looked so good. Maybe the red ones are worse than other colors.
Style: Size: 4 Pieces Bath Towels | Color: Burgundy

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 7, 2021
Author: Joy H.
Title: Disappointed in these towels
Body: I had high hopes for a product claiming to have highly rated cotton. I have HE appliances. I was in cold water, even the reds. I've been around the block a few times when it comes to towels and laundry. These towels are not high quality. The lint and fiber from these towels filled my lint trap in my dryer with only 2 bath towels, 2 face towels, and 2 washcloths. Ridiculous. I washed the red by themselves, and the blue by themselves. But I put them both in the dryer figuring I could save energy, and plus it is supposed to be high quality fiber cotton. Nope. Now I have red balls on my blue towels, and blue balls on my red towels. If you are NOT OK with an incredible amount of shedding, stay away from buying these. Don't waste your money or your time. These are NOT high quality towels.
Style: Size: 6 Pieces Towel Set | Color: Navy Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 21, 2021
Author: Shades_of_coralrae
Title: Super soft and would recommend to friends & family
Body: I bought two sets of these towels.I washed them once, after purchasing, and my husband complained about towel lint sticking to him.Of course, I had to try them out. Yes, they did leave lint during the drying process.After washing all 8 again, the problem resolved itself.One thing that I'd like to mention, but may be lost in translation, is the Charmin Effect.It almost feels, because they are so soft, that lotion was applied to them and they smoothly glide over your body.It's not a bad thing, just something I notice when using them.Also, they do seem to lose some of their thickness after continued use and laundering.Don't let that detour you from considering them as a purchase, though, because they still *feel* thick, soft, and absorbent.Banding on ends do not interfere with the functionality of the towels.
Style: Size: 4 Pieces Bath Towels | Color: Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2020
Author: C. J.
Title: Red and Gray shed, but they're awesome towels
Body: I bought 3 (burgundy, blue, green) sets for my kids and they were soft when pulled from the package. Washed each separately per instructions and they have held up so far. There was no pilling or lint balls when they came out of the dryer but the lint trap caught a lot, especially the red. So definitely wash separately  the first time per instructions.  I *love* the feel and the colors are true. They're not as thick as my Egyptian cotton towels (which is actually good since they're for kids) but they are just as soft and absorbant (took 2 turns on the dryer on low heat to dry so they definitely hold water) without the weight of my Egyptian cotton towels. Great buy. Would definitely recommend.UPDATE: I've had them about a month. Kids love how soft they are. They've been washed and they hold up well. Still soft, be careful not to burn/overdry, of course. DOWNSIDE: red sheds. Washed it with the rest and it shed a decent amount on all of them. 99% came off in the dryer (dried red separately to prevent further contamination, if you will), but something to note. Also, the gray sheds a bunch too (meaning even after 1st wash, give it and the red 2-3 independent washez before you wash with something else). The blue and green don't seem to have that issue.
Style: Size: 6 Pieces Towel Set | Color: Burgundy

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 9, 2019
Author: JoanB
Title: Soft, thick

When I went through the return section, they wanted me to pay shipping.  I always thought that "free returns" meant it is no risk, and returns are really free.  When an item says free returns,  I am more motivated to purchase it, and I do end up keeping most things I buy on Amazon.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2021
Author: bonniebaker
Title: FORTY BUCKS WORTH OF TOWEL ENDS UP IN THE LINT TRAP!
Body: As you'd expect from the price, they are on the thin side. But the biggest problem is they shed.  I've washed them once and my dryer lint trap was FULL. In the past few days, I've noticed they are also shedding all over my shower tile floor.  I know they're on the cheap side, but REALLY, One more washing cycle and they'll likely disappear.  I'll probably use these for my dog. Don't waste your money.
Style: Size: 4 Pieces Bath Towels | Color: Black

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2020
Author: Consumer
Title: Navy Blue towels are thicker than Grey towels
Body: After trying the Grey towels (6 pce set) for almost 2 months and liking them, I got 4 bath towels in Navy blue, thinking they would be the same quality. They are not the same. Labels are different.Grey towels : thinner, very absorbent, quick drying, no loop for hanging.Navy Blue towels : thicker, seems absorbent, not as quick to dry because thicker, loop for hanging.I very much liked the Grey towels because they are great to take along when traveling. Thin, absorbent and very quick to dry yet feels soft. Navy blue towels are too thick and take longer to dry so impractical to take on travels.Loads of lint. Had to remove lint mid-way when drying 4 bath towels in the dryer. Also, some shrinkage too. Probably meant to be line dried like most average households do in Turkey, not in dryer.
Style: Size: 4 Pieces Bath Towels | Color: Navy Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2019
Author: mehmet adam
Title: Soft and absorbent
Body: I have used these for a week and i am sold. I ordered 4 pack set in silver grey color and it came in a nice package. I always order Turkish cotton. Because Turkish cotton is so durable so i have faith that my towels will last longer. These towels are elegant, lovely towels and wash up nicely. Soft and absorbent yet dry quickly. Also great for traveling because they are light. Highly recommended !!!
Style: Size: 4 Pieces Bath Towels | Color: Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2019
Author: Jessica Gibson
Title: Fuzzies Come off Towels
Body: The towels have a weird texture. They absorb water really well and quickly. Fuzzies come off the towels every time you use them. I almost have to lint roll my body after I shower.

They seem colorfast but I must caution I soaked them in the vinegar/salt/water solution (you can find a recipe online) for 24 hours because I really wanted to ensure they maintained the nice color. Then I washed in cold water and the color remained great. Using them now and quite pleased.

Author: Trisha
Title: Soft

Style: Size: 4 Pieces Bath Towels | Color: Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 2, 2020
Author: ColeMc3
Title: They are very soft, but...
Body: I think these are waterproof or something. People are saying how absorbent they are, don't believe it. When water touches them it sits on top of the material instead of soaking in.  So when I try to dry my hands or my body with these, they feel very cold and wet without removing the water from me, its like, just passing the water back and forth to the towel. It's not a good feeling and I have to wipe my hands several times just to keep them from being sopping wet. This material is the pits. It's very soft.. and not cotton at all, maybe rayon or polyester? Something that does not hold water. Pretty colors though. I give it three stars for being soft, colorful and minus two stars for not doing what they are supposed to do... dry me off. Oh and.. they are VERY TINY. More like hair towels if you weigh more than 100 pounds. I think I will spend a little more and get my towels from a department store of some kind, at least then I know what I'm getting.
Style: Size: 6 Pieces Towel Set | Color: Green

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2019
Author: SummerSky
Title: Thin Towels
Body: Thinner towel, well made but it‚Äôs not plush, thick or absorbent. The color is accurate and true to the photo. If you prefer a thinner towel then this is the one for you. My preference is for a thicker towel, but not too thick as don‚Äôt care for that either when it‚Äôs more like a blanket than a towel.  Just too thin, not the bottom of the line cheap style thin towel so can still use them but thinner than I prefer.
Style: Size: 4 Pieces Hand Towels | Color: Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2021
Author: Allison
Title: NOT ‚Äúburgundy‚Äù
Body: I bought this set of four burgundy-colored hand towels for my powder room.  I am disappointed for three reasons:  (1) the four hand towels I received are much more plain than the seller‚Äôs photo, which shows a stack of four folded towels that have a LOT more detail/design/trim to them.  I am guessing that the picture is showing four bath towels and not hand towels which are sometimes more plain (see my photo of the hand towels I received).  (2) They are not ‚Äúpremium quality‚Äù feeling.  I would not describe them as ‚Äúthin‚Äù but they sure are not thick either.  I‚Äôd rate them a ‚ÄúC‚Äù regarding ‚Äúfeel‚Äù for a guest towel.  (3) I ordered burgundy‚Äîthese are way too red and so they do not match my bath mats (see the comparison in my photos).  I would say these towels are more cranberry.  To help you gauge the color, I took a photo of them next to a Folger‚Äôs coffee container which is bright orangy-red.  For the $18.99 I paid for four, I think I would have been reasonably happy if they were at least the right color.  But given that the color and style are totally wrong, and the quality is mediocre, I am giving 3 stars.UPDATE:  I did a really dumb thing. I hung the towels looking at only the more plain end and missed the more decorative pattern at the other end of the towels!  I noticed this after I washed them and re-hung them the other way. The decoration is exactly as pictured‚Äîon one end of the towels. The other end is more plain. I increased from 3 to 4 stars. I took another photo to show you.I write honest reviews to help others make informed purchases because I read reviews myself and appreciate how helpful they can be.  I hope that my review helped you!
Style: Size: 4 Pieces Hand Towels | Color: Burgundy

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 8, 2021
Author: Joseph M.
Title: Lint everywhere! ZERO STARS!
Body: So this is the first time I have bought red towels and, oh my God, there's lint everywhere. EVERYWHERE! I have purchased towels before and I know you are supposed to wash them before using because there will be some lint. SOME lint. Dude, you should have seen how the lint trap overflowed with it. I was like, "Holy moly that's a lot of lint"! I knew I had better not use these yet so I put them through another wash. It was just as much went the second time! I could have built a whole beach towel if I had saved it all. Nevermind the lint that is now all over my clothes, countertops, dishes, and bathtub. Never seen so much lint. I'm surprised to see that the towels had not completely disintegrated it was so much. Does this always happen and I just never noticed before because I usually buy white towels? I'm going to have to wash these a third time. Does anyone know of any specific brand of towels that do not have a lint problem? Would love to know. 9/2/21 - UPDATE - Oh my god there is so much lint! These towels have been the bane of my existence. Do not buy these towels. You would think the manufacturer would wash/beat the lint out of the product before putting it out to market. They do not! The seller should be obligated to contact the manufacturer to request this. No, they should insist! They are clearly cutting corners. The amount of lint is insane! Buy other towels! Any other towels!
Style: Size: 6 Pieces Towel Set | Color: Burgundy

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 8, 2021
Author: Nelda
Title: Lovely color, lovely feel
Body: I ordered the burgundy, which is a lovely, vibrant color that really perks up the bathroom. The set is absorbent and soft to the touch. The hand towels are also longer than the usual length, which I like because there's more room for drying hands and they hang down longer from the rod, thus easier for shorter grandchildren to reach. I was careful to wash and dry the set alone before first use--as advised by the manufacturer. A lot of lint came out of the set, so I'm glad I washed them alone. I've also been careful to wash them with like colors since then as they still seem to shed lint--but mainly in the dryer. (They are shedding less and less as time goes by; I think I'm now on the fourth or fifth washing.) I also fear they may bleed color on lighter clothes. The color is still vibrant however. Other than the lint, I love these towels and rags. I would purchase again.
Style: Size: 6 Pieces Towel Set | Color: Burgundy

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2021
Author: Animal Lover
Title: I wasted money!!
Body: I wanted to have black bath towels, and I bought four towels.  Before use them, I washed in a washer and dried in a dryer.  The dust net of dryer was full of black lint.  I though it will ok to use now because these towels have no more extra lint.  My husband complained after using because his body was full of lint, and there are lots of lint in a bathroom.  I washed them again, and there were still tons of black lint on a dryer net.  I washed my hands and used one of the towels.  It left black lint.... These are really trash.
Style: Size: 4 Pieces Bath Towels | Color: Black

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2021
Author: pete rowe
Title: DO NOT BUY, YIU HAVE BEEN WARNED
Body: These towels are straight garbage. Forget about all that fancy cotton they are mentioning. I washed them twice and they were still shedding lint like crazy. They clogged my washing machine, had to clean the dryer lint trap twice before they dried. If hold them up to the light and shake them, you see lint particles everywhere. They covered my clothes that I was wearing with lint just taking them from the dryer to my bedroom. I can just imagine someone with allergies how these particles would be. DO NOT BUY, YOU HAVE BEEN WARNED
Style: Size: 6 Pieces Towel Set | Color: Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2020

Title: LINT LINT LING
Body: I bought these because they looked good and the reviews were decent. BUT the first time I washed them the lint catcher was so full... I thought, oh, its the first time they're washed. BUT the lint was all over my dark clothes... I had to rewash all my clothes. So the next time, I thought, ok.... this is the second wash, all should be ok. NOPE! NOPE! NOPE!!!! The lint was AGAIN all over my clothes... and again, required a second wash. SCREW THIS! I threw them out when I realized I should have just returned them... alas... too late. DO NOT BUY or WASH ALONE!!!!!!

Forget washing anything with these towels, they shed all over everything!!! These are NOT 100% Turkish cotton. The towels have stretch to them and are not absorbent. They are a polyester blend. Save your money, I'm literally throwing mine away! Your reviews help me with my shopping selections. I hope this one helps you.

Body: Our order just arrived. They are Beautiful, and so very soft, and we haven't even washed them, yet, as requested. Thank you!!!! Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2020
Author: Jennifer Williams
Title: My review might have been different had I washed them first . . .
Body: I'm anticipating needing to wash them separately because of that, and one washcloth did bleed a bit when I first got it wet, but I think that was just the initial from-the-factory effect, because it didn't continue during the bath.I don't need or want towels so thick and plush they feel like a blanket, and I wouldn't call these plush, but they're not the kind of thin that makes you think they're cheap, either.  Plenty absorbent.  Seem like good quality.They're standard bath towel size--not gonna wrap around a large person, but I didn't feel ripped off, either.If I remember, I'll report back a few months and a few washes from now, to share how they hold up, but for now, they seem like a good value.
Style: Size: 6 Pieces Towel Set | Color: Burgundy

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2021
Author: Katherine
Title: Never Purchase Again
Body: Purchased two sets. Per instructions, I prewashed.  I used multiple times. After another three washings these towels are still dropping too much lint.  Lint in the shower when drying, on my body, on the floor. Lint on other clothes in the washer and dryer. I won't make the mistake of purchasing these again! I purchased these because the local store didn't have my preferred brand in stock. I should have just waited.  Waste of money.
Style: Size: 6 Pieces Towel Set | Color: Navy Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 19, 2021
Author: TeffanyNguyen
Title: Super soft and fluffy!
Body: We love the towels! I did wash and dry before use to make sure we got all the lint off of them and they were great! I do wash the towels separately since purchasing these. I got 2 orders so 8 total and every once in a while a towel will get lost within the laundry and get washed with our clothes but no piling, no extra lint (other than from the first wash and dry). I will order more if we move and need them for guests but so far we love them. I did think it was weird that the 2 sets from the same buyer had different tags on the towels, didn‚Äôt bother me but it was something that I noticed.
Style: Size: 4 Pieces Bath Towels | Color: White

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2021
Author: loon
Title: It's time to throw in the towel
Body: It's hard to explain how disappointing these towels are. I should have believed the reviews warning about endless shedding and fuzz. It seems like there is a big quality control issue at the very least as there are plenty of reviews stating as much.Got these a month ago. Each piece of the towel set has now been through the washer and dryer at least 6 times and has been used multiple times daily for two weeks (each). Today was the first time I put them in to wash with something else (dish towels). They are shedding more than ever. It may actually be worse than last week. And my dish towels are covered now too. And it isn't just in the machine. They cover me with blue fuzz every time I use them and my bathroom is coated in it even though I have cleaned it up almost daily. Constant annoyance for the past month.I tried to give them the benefit of the doubt. I thought they would shed all the excess eventually. I was wrong.It's time to throw in the towel. I imagine I will be finding this blue fuzz in my apartment for the next year to remind me of my mistake. Purchase at your own peril.
Style: Size: 6 Pieces Towel Set | Color: Navy Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2020
Author: red maple
Title: Not the quality I expected
Body: From the reviews I expected better product. The towels are soft but the fine fabric came loose in the wash and when I wiped my wet face they would stick to the skin after the first few washes ; super irritating. Now after 4 or 5 washes that doesn‚Äôt happen anymore  but the vivid color (deep blue) has already faded though I only use cold water. I have so much better towels than this; this product didn‚Äôt meet my expectations.
Style: Size: 4 Pieces Hand Towels | Color: Navy Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2021
Author: Elizabeth A.
Title: sheds a LOT first time through the washing machine
Body: These towels SEEMED nice when I first got them.  I used them once, and they SEEMED fine.  But then I washed them.  There was a LOT of shedding left behind all over the washing machine and other towels I washed them with, a LOT of lint from these towels in the lint tray in the dryer, and also a LOT of little pieces from these towels all over the other towels when I folded them.  A mess everywhere, basically.  I immediately threw away all four of these towels - pointless to have towels that come apart so much.  I can only imagine that the good reviews these towels got must have been left BEFORE people washed the towels the first time.
Style: Size: 4 Pieces Bath Towels | Color: Navy Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 18, 2021
Author: Charlene
Title: Towels are fine. Seller not so much
Body: Nice, soft towels. They look just as described. Just got them today and put them in the wash. Will see how they come out. So far so good. Will be using them in the guest bath as decor. They are priced well based on what the quality appears to be.**Updated: so they tell you to text them for more ‚Äúfree‚Äù towels. You text them then they ask you to post a review/send screenshot. Then they say they will ship the free towels within 48 hours. That was on 5/18/21. Fishy?
Style: Size: 4 Pieces Hand Towels | Color: White

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 20, 2021
Author: Mcewern
Title: Beautiful quality towel with a bonus: lots of lint!
Body: I ordered these as a gift and prewashed and dried them before preparing the stacks for gifting (they don't arrive like this photo, it's my presentation).Towels always need to be washed before using, and will often shed lint in dryer. This brand fluffed up beautifully but shed so much lint! Also being red, they bled in the washer, even in cold water, so don't wash with any other clothes, and clear the lint filter on the dryer every 10 minutes or so the first time you wash them. Otherwise, they are plush and the color is true to photos....the mfr calls this color burgandy, but it's really more "cabernet," blood red. I love it, hope the recipient does, too.Recommended.
Style: Size: 6 Pieces Towel Set | Color: Burgundy

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2021
Author: Gomershad
Title: Initial Lint = Very High Quality
Body: These are really nice towels.  There's a little card or sticker included when they're delivered telling you to be sure to launder them before using.  Yes, be sure to do that, in a separate load - they'll put out a lot of lint.  From what I've researched/read and based on my experience, a lot of lint when new is a sign of a very high-quality towel.  And, it's true with these.  Very absorbent, and they dry quickly in the dryer.  I bought 4 hand towels.  I'll follow-up with some bath sheets now.
Style: Size: 4 Pieces Hand Towels | Color: Burgundy

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2021
Author: Richard Lloyd
Title: Shedding Towels Make a Moulting Mess When Washed and Dried
Body: These towels shed - big time - even after being washed several times. They made an awful mess of both my washer and clothes dryer. I spent an hour digging large fistfuls of moulting bits of towel from my dryer. The screen could not handle the mess. Washing new towels with either vinegar or baking soda before using them is a tip offered online.As for me, I am going to donate these towels to Salvation Army. Beware before buying.
Style: Size: 6 Pieces Towel Set | Color: Navy Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2020
Author: Susan K. Benuska-Archer
Title: The dye bleeds horribly!!
Body: I washed the red bath towels and cloths in cold water, which left lint and a slight red stain in my washing machine.  After they went through a cycle in the dryer, the lint trap was THICK with red lint, which continued to a lesser degree with the subsequent 3 or so loads of regular laundry.  I ordered Retayne, with the hope to get the dye to stay in the fibers.  I will not purchase from this supplier ever again.
Style: Size: 6 Pieces Towel Set | Color: Burgundy

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2021
Author: Tasha Ragland
Title: Return Customer!!!
Body: This is my second purchase of these towels.  They arrived quickly. üëçThey were packaged well üëç. They look great, feel thick and soft üëç.  I washed & dried them as instructed as soon as I got them. üëçThey came out of the wash great!!! üëçNo bleeding of color, no mess in my washer or dryer, no tearing and no fading of color.  You will have to clean out your lint tray after drying them.  I am very happy with my purchase.  Buy them already!!!
Style: Size: 6 Pieces Towel Set | Color: Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2021
Author: Carmen Woodward
Title: Amazing quality
Body: I am really particular about what I want in a towel.  I want thickness, softness, and good absorbency.  I have had a difficult time in the past finding a towel with all three qualities.  I read so many reviews for different towels on Amazon looking for the perfect towel.  When I read the reviews about these Turkish cotton towels, I was convinced to buy them and give them a try.  I have not been one bit disappointed in my decision. These towels are amazing quality!! They are thick, soft, and super absorbent!! They actually absorb the water from the body instead of just displacing it! I highly recommend these awesome towels!!!!
Style: Size: 4 Pieces Bath Towels | Color: Navy Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 2, 2020

Title: Nice weight towels and secure stitching. Low lint.
Body: I washed 8 new towels and was surprised that the lint shed was lower than usual. Normally, on the first wash I have to clean the dryer filter at least once before the cycle ends because there is so much lint. Hopeful that this indicates quality and long life for this set of towels!

Title: Disappointed
Body: Have not used yet. However upon opening I am disappointed. In my pictures you can see how thin and almost see through these towels are! The whole stack of four is shorter than my hand,I‚Äôm a small 5‚Äô2‚Äù person. Will be returning
Style: Size: 4 Pieces Bath Towels | Color: White

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2020
Author: Siegfried Heydrich
Title: Good towels
Body: But the tags? Make them pullaways, rather than having them tear away the stitching from the towels when you pull them off. Author: Shawn
Title: Yellow Lint Raining Everywhere! Wish my pictures would‚Äôve uploaded.
Body: I wish I‚Äôd known you have to be ‚Äúin‚Äù the review to add the pictures. My entire floor was covered in yellow lint. My navy blue shirt I had on was COVERED in yellow lint. I‚Äôve have bought cheap and expensive towels from several stores. Discount to department stores; and I have never experienced this. As I take towels from the machine I do the hard shake. The first time I washed them I didn‚Äôt do  this because I just tossed them in the dryer. Out of nowhere my dryer broke so on my SECOND wash I talking all my towels out and they were all covered in the lint from this set.They‚Äôre cute, decent looking towels. Bright and remained this way through both washes.I had to sweep up the lint and it was almost a fist size of lint. I had to wash my washing machine to get the lint from there. I‚Äôll use these this last time and throw them away. Buyer BEWARE!Update: I added a photo of another towel that was ruined by the yellow set. This towel is more than 2 years old and it never had lint from any other towel on it.
Style: Size: 6 Pieces Towel Set | Color: Yellow

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 7, 2021
Author: mermaid starboard
Title: Don't let the size of packaging alarm you!
Body: I was somewhat disappointed when receiving the box.  It was rather small which immediately made me think my towels were going to be cheaply made. So point number one...vendors- make a great impression when packaging merchandise. Because now no matter how wonderful the towels actually might be I've already concluded otherwise by receiving this small box.  Okay I unrolled the jammed-packed towels, 2 sets flattened down like yesterday's pancakes and took off in a state of frenzy to the washing machine. The end result were nice soft fluffy towels, although smaller than I anticipated, and being black the color held nicely.  Point number two. Don't forget to check out the size because a few inches can make a big difference, not everyone is built like a celery stalk.  Overall there weren't any great savings and I missed the joy of feeling the towels before buying them. It's a personal thing. I have to say the towels are made very well...thought u might want to know!
Style: Size: 6 Pieces Towel Set | Color: Black

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2021
Author: M. Alleu
Title: So far excellent towels
Body: So far so good, they washed up nicely and are super soft. They will likely keep making a ton of lint for the first few washings or so but that just means they are high quality. As they lose this fuzz they will also continue to be a more absorbent towel. Have had a similar set of towels for close to ten years and i expect these to give me many years of use too. I'm always leery of new towels, most are cheap low quality or shrink, but these are likely worth every penny i spent. A bit pricey and way better than buying towels from Kohls or Walmart that shread, shrink or the edge trim comes loose. BUY THESE TOWELS, YOU WILL LOVE THEM!!!
Style: Size: 6 Pieces Towel Set | Color: Burgundy

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 15, 2021
Author: Marlene D.
Title: Terrible quality for the price.
Body: I posted a review before I used these towels which was a mistake. After three washings and multiple spins in the dryer this red and blue towel sets are still shedding a lot of lint. I would have expected after a couple washings the lint would be gone. After a shower the bathtub is still full of it. They certainly are not hotel quality as advertised.After I posted this review, trying to salvage the five sets of towels, I washed each individual set of them on a heavy duty setting which was 1-1/2 hour rigorous washing. After which I had to clean the washer of lint and strings. Next into the dryer that I had to clean the screen every ten minutes ending up with more than a fist full of lint. then another 30 minutes of just air dry. They seemed to have softened up but the true test is yet to come. To see how much is left on my body and in the shower after the next use. Shouldn't have to do any of this with a quality towel set. I still have time to return and I don't care if they've been washed how else will you know if they're any good.
Style: Size: 6 Pieces Towel Set | Color: Green

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 11, 2021
Author: Laina
Title: Very nice towels, absorbent and pretty.
Body: I would have liked to pay a little less and only needed 2 burgundy hand towels, but this was the best I could find. They feel like very good quality thick towels, definitely absorbent, huge plus, and they are a very pretty red color. Maybe a little brighter red than typical burgundy, but that was what I wanted. And glad they're not the giant size hand towels I've been seeing. They are bigger than normal, but I had tried some that hung all the way down to the countertop which I did not like, so these work well. I do recommend, and would buy again. I washed before using, not a ton of lint, and they held up well, color looked great still. I think one string might have come loose on one, but overall, not a big deal to me.
Style: Size: 4 Pieces Hand Towels | Color: Burgundy

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2021
Author: Kyle C
Title: The towels are ok but..
Body: The amount of lint coming off these things even after numerous washes is crazy. Literally after at least 8 washes this towel still sheds lots of lint. I will shower dry my self off and find lint on my chest and face. I don't recommend unless you don't care about the lint. It is still soft and absorbs well but the lint shedding is ridiculous.
Style: Size: 4 Pieces Bath Towels | Color: Green

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2021

Title: Horrible Quality

They are a dark reddish color, so I put them in a dark wash‚Ä¶BIG MISTAKE!!!Red lint came off in the washing machine and is all over all of my dark clothes and even stuck to the sides of my washing machine. I‚Äôm currently washing them alone to see if the stuck lint will come off of the inside of my washing machine. I‚Äôm absolutely furious! The other clothes are in my dryer & I'm hoping the lint will come off and go into the lint trap.
Style: Size: 4 Pieces Hand Towels | Color: Burgundy

With getting 4 in a set, it's easy to use as either decoration, for it's intended purpose, or for both based on your needs.These towels are pretty soft and seem rather absorbent.  I think that compared to their price, the absorbency and softness is very good.Overall, these towels are great.  They look good, can be used however you need, and are well-functional.  I recommend these towels to anyone needing new towels, as these work great!

Title: That's a LOT of lint!!!
Body: Well, they seem like good towels; however, I was kind of surprised that after 3 runs through washer and dryer they are still producing massive amounts of lint. I'm just finishing the 3rd run the the w&d.. the first one was pretty bad.. lots of material in the bottom of the washer machine. I think it might take 1 more run through to get to the point where I dont get covered in lint whe I attempt to use them. I gave a good washer and dryer. When the user tries to dry themselves off, they are covered in lint. My daughter in law had to get back into the shower to wash the stuff off. Never have I had such really bad towels. Don't purchase!

Author: Chuck
Title: Never seem to quit shedding....check the dryer lint trap frequently
Body: LOVE the softness and color of the towels, however, even after multiple washings and dryings, they STILL shed.  The white bathroom floor shows the lint and it's also in the bottom of our shower.  Warning...when you dry the washed towels the first two times, check your lint trap every 15 minutes because it will be full and need emptying.We bought 2 sets, the burgundy and the navy blue and they both have this issue.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 23, 2021
Author: Jennifer Stark
Title: They Leave Lint on You!
Body: I‚Äôve washed these multiple times (probably around 8 washes) and they STILL leave lint on my body when I use them.Yea, they are soft and absorbent but they are so linty! It‚Äôs gross to dry off and have little lint fuzzies stuck to your skin. I would return them if I could but I kept washing them in hopes it would get better and I‚Äôm now past the 30 day return window.These towels are now going to be downgraded to ‚Äúdog towels‚Äù because I can‚Äôt handle the fuzz on my body and I‚Äôm sick of constantly hoping thell get better.
Style: Size: 6 Pieces Towel Set | Color: Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2021
Author: Katinka
Title: Please read - more rag fabric than towel
Body: Please belive me that despite these towels looking good, they disintegrate on the first wash! They were washed before using and the lint trap had to be cleaned out twice with thick mats of fine towel lint everywhere.The towels got pulls and picks in the wash...again, before use. One towel was then used once and it absorbed very little. They are soft, though. Just useless  rags...This is not a wacko crazy hateful review  - just an attempt to advise and inform. Save your hard earned money.
Style: Size: 4 Pieces Bath Towels | Color: Brown

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 3, 2021
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: They shed
Body: They are very pretty and soft. I would probably buy them again. I did not read the instructions. SO! Before use you are supposed to soak the towels in water for 12 hours to (fluff the fabric). I did not, I washed them. When we used them they shed tiny red fibers all over us. In our eyes and noses. Everything. SO I followed the instructions and soaked them for 12 hours in a bath tub of water. It worked! They no longer shed! I love them!The red is very rich.
Style: Size: 4 Pieces Bath Towels | Color: Burgundy

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2021
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Avoid these poorly manufactured towels
Body: I was terribly disappointed with these handsome towels.  I purchased both hand towels and bath towels, and they're all a huge letdown.  It's as though they a bunch of dryer lint was glued together in the manufacturing process instead of expensive fabric being woven together.  Every time I use one, I spend at least 5 minutes picking all of the little balls of fabric off of my face, neck, hands, arms, and legs.  They're soft, but they're disintegrating rapidly after only two washings.  I should have spent more money.  :(
Style: Size: 4 Pieces Bath Towels | Color: Black

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2019
Author: F. Fischer
Title: Thin & very light weight towels
Body: Soft feel, but lower quality, thin & very light weight towels that do not compare in density to moderately priced 5 yr old towels in our linen cabinet!  We have heavier kitchen towels! These Turkish Cotton bath towels are so thin that while they would likely absorb well, you would likely have to use 2 to dry well! And we're concerned that they would not last very long. Considering they were on a "lightening deal" these worked out to $7 a towel; about what they are actually worth, comparing to what we get on sale locally for around $10-$12 per towel. We returned the same day they arrived!
Style: Size: 4 Pieces Bath Towels | Color: Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2021
Author: Laurie
Title: Turkish hand towels/bath towels
Body: I'm amending my first 5 star review of these towels.  When I received them they looked beautiful and were really soft.  Well, the first time I washed them they had an unbelievable amount of lint that came off of them.  All in my  dryer lint tray which was overflowing with it.  After second and third and even a fourth wash and still getting lint coming off of these towels, I no longer recommend them.  If you throw anything else in with it---forget it!!! it will be covered in lint.  Also, if  you  give them a good review, they will send you more towels?  At least thats what they said.  I didn't receive any.  Oh well!  I would still be washing the lint off of them anyway.  So disappointed.
Style: Size: 4 Pieces Hand Towels | Color: Brown

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 4, 2021
Author: Nicole
Title: Not durable
Body: I gave these a shot because so many reviews mentioned it being high-quality, but threads started to come apart after the very first wash. It‚Äôs an okay budget towel for a short term use for something like a college student, I suppose. But not an investment item.
Style: Size: 4 Pieces Bath Towels | Color: Navy Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 27, 2021
Author: Terra T.
Title: Great towels for a great price
Body: We bought a set of these towels to try them out and they are great! We just ordered 5 more sets and are replacing all the towels in our house.They‚Äôre thick and soft and absorb the water really well. They aren‚Äôt tiny little towels that only cover half the bits.Definitely wash them first as they do shed a little bit. After one wash this wasn‚Äôt a problem anymore.
Style: Size: 4 Pieces Bath Towels | Color: Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2020
Author: DeejKB
Title: Soft, absorbent
Body: I couldn't give this a 5 rating due to the fact there were already a couple threads loose that had to be pulled or cut after washing the first time.  Other than that, they are medium thickness and very soft and absorbent. Nice towels for extra at home, kids bath, and college students. If you're looking for premium/luxury towels for guests, I'd maybe keep looking, but they are quite nice for daily use/kids/teens/college. Nice color grey. Packaged well.
Style: Size: 4 Pieces Bath Towels | Color: Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2021
Author: Jay
Title: Average bath towels
Body: Was really hoping these were going to be a little more plush. To be honest, they feel like the amazon brand we use for airbnb's. Washed once prior to use and still had a load of black fuzzies on me after showering - no bueno.
Style: Size: 6 Pieces Towel Set | Color: Black

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 1, 2021
Author: Leanne C
Title: Constant shedding of lint and fuzz
Body: These towels are terrible. Total waste of money. I purchased the black ones. I washed them before use and fuzz and lint from the towel gets all over when getting out of the shower. So, I thought maybe I‚Äôll just wash them twice and they‚Äôll be fine. No, same thing. Trying to dry off from a shower and lint residue covers your whole body it is so annoying and I am very upset I wasted money on these.
Style: Size: 4 Pieces Bath Towels | Color: Black

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2020
Author: mesh
Title: Great thickness
Body: These Turkish Bath Hand Towels are impressive! Beautiful yellow just as shown. True to glorious size. Truly thick. 100% cotton & made in Turkey! So very pleased! My pictures are after a washing on warm, regular dry which they recommend before using. The coloring is a deeper yellow despite my pictures taking that away due to the light. Very absorbent & super soft. A 4 pack of this quality for what I paid was wonderful! I definitely recommend!
Style: Size: 4 Pieces Hand Towels | Color: Yellow

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2021
Author: Gabriela Arroyo
Title: Still full of lint even after washing
Body: Update: after about 5 washes they are still full of lint. I can't dry my face without getting a face sticky with black spots. This was a fail. Don't bother with black regardless of makeup hiders.These are super fluffy and soft! Problem is they are still linty. I washed them before first use but I still got a face full of black lint so how long is this going to last?
Style: Size: 4 Pieces Washcloths | Color: Black

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2021
Author: DigiJazz
Title: Very soft

These towels are so soft and so absorbent. Just wish these were full set of 4. Will probably buy more

Author: Alishia  Klynstra
Title: Only buy white

Author: STAR

Author: Stacie M Downs
Title: Do NOT Recommend

I will have dark blue lint all over my face after a shower. I have tried washing them numerous times thinking it might help and it has not.

Author: Amazon Customer

Author: Karen Ann Mitchell
Title: Soft and fluffy towels that hold up well through washings

The hand  towels and wash cloths performed just as well as the bath towel.  I would buy this brand again,  if I need a set in a different color.

Author: EBeth523
Title: They went through the wash fine. I got the gray/silver color and washed them ...
Body: I just ordered these.  They went through the wash fine.  I got the gray/silver color and washed them with a load of whites in hot water with Oxyclean and detergent and they didn't bleed or discolor.  I really like that as I like to wash my towels in hot water and now I can throw these into the wash with the rest of the towels.
Style: Size: 4 Pieces Washcloths | Color: Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2020
Author: marc griffin
Title: (Please read entire review) towels are thinner than I had expected
Body: The wash clothes are fine, the hand towels are a little thin, but the bath towels were thin and smaller than advertised. by an 2 inches length and an inch width. For the price though I can't complain too much!  I also chalk the size problem with possible manufacturing error because the embroidery stitch's (I think that is the name) appeared to vary in size.  With all that being said, though towels seemed thin they were pretty absorbent.  I like the texture of the wash clothes and the hand towels. The bath towels were very soft and comfortable to use on sensitive skin. I have washed the towels numerous times now and I am happy to say that they have not faded, there is no piling, and very little lint has come off towels from first was to present!  Finally, I am VERY PICKY so my review should only be taken lightly and that it the size variance was probably 1 out of 1,000! I don't believe that the thickness of the product was a mistake though because the towels were pretty much universally the same.
Style: Size: 6 Pieces Towel Set | Color: Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 13, 2020
Author: Amazonian
Title: Don't absorb water
Body: I don't understand where all the good reviews are coming from. These towels do not absorb water, it just sits on top and they always feels wet. They look great and are soft, but they are completely useless if you can't dry off with them. Maybe other people are getting different towels - makes no sense to me how someone could give them 5 stars.
Style: Size: 4 Pieces Bath Towels | Color: Burgundy

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2021

Title: Quality Towels

Body: I actually ordered these as a last resort- I was trying to order towels from costco for my son moving into his dorm.  We had been using the thick towels from costco for years and really love the quality but they couldn‚Äôt be delivered in time, not to mention the additional shipping charge.  So I ordered these since the the deliver was going to be super fast, and the price was actually better than Costco.  I did have my doubts as to whether the quality was going to be as good.  I checked with him today and he said they were ‚ÄúSOOOOOOO nice.  So much better quality and super absorbent.‚Äù  Glad i ordered these and I will be ordering some for myself next time I need towels!

Author: My Experience
Title: DECENT TOWELS FOR GUEST BATHROOM
Body: Although these towels aren't very thick or plush, they do the job well enough. We keep these in our guest bathroom. If we have several guests, they don't absorb as well after a while, but it's never gotten to the point of having to replace them during a dinner party. The last towels I bought for Christmas last year held up in the laundry. No fraying after a dozen washings. If the towels were thicker, I'd assume they'd be more absorbent and give them a 5-star rating.  Despite that, I recommend these towels for everyday use.
Style: Size: 4 Pieces Hand Towels | Color: Burgundy

Author: ReedWriter
Title: Neither soft nor absorbent
Body: I read many of the reviews before purchasing a these towels. They are certainly beautiful, and the softness and absorbency may improve with more washings, but as of now, after the initial washing, I have to say that I am disappointed. It would be far better for Amazon to solicit these reviews a few months after delivery rather than the day of or after delivery, and I will update if I feel compelled to upgrade my review. As for lint, no more or less than other towels. I have front load Samsung w&d, couple of years old, so pretty state of the art machines. I certainly expected more lint, but it just wasn‚Äôt there. The towels aren‚Äôt very soft, but again, this may improve with more washings. Overall, lovely towel sets, but probably more for decor than for actual use. At the this point, I would be reluctant to recommend for every day use towels.
Style: Size: 6 Pieces Towel Set | Color: White

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 18, 2021
Author: Kenny
Title: A lot of lint, sheds when used
Body: Just purchased but got quite a bit of lint when I first washed them and a lot of color bleeding.I soaked in cold water for several hours.Then I ran thru two additional cold wash cycles without detergent.  I had a lot of fuzz in washer along with the burgundy color bleeding.  Then I dried them on low heat, I had to clean dryer lint trap three times during drying.They seem absorbant and soft.But a lot of fuzz coming off them and the seems are already fraying on a few of the towels.Give them a try but not impressed.A lot of lint so far, bleeding of color, and frays on a few seems I had to clip of with scissors.Too much work for price.
Style: Size: 4 Pieces Bath Towels | Color: Burgundy

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 21, 2021
Author: A Bee
Title: WHEN WILL THE LINT STOP??
Body: UPDATE 8/17/21: I've now had these towels since March, and they are still shedding lint like crazy. They've been washed at least once a week since I bought them. There is black fuzz everywhere in my bathroom. Tub, sink, counters, even the toilet. I've gone from wiping down the bathroom once a week to every other day due to lint. I've downgraded my rating from 3 stars to 1, and I certainly wouldn't recommend the black towels to anyone.Bought the black. So. Much. Lint. I followed the recommendation to wash them before first use. Still lint everywhere. Washed a second time. Still lint everywhere. I've washed them four times now, yes, following cleaning instructions. Now they've color faded and are still shedding lint.
Style: Size: 4 Pieces Bath Towels | Color: Black

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2021
Author: Tina K.
Title: Ummm...No.
Body: Those photos of big, fluffy towels are a misrepresentation of the actual products. The hand towels and wash cloths are ok. However, the bath towels are a complete disappointment. They are thin, cheap looking, and chintzy. And boy, do they shed! Based on other negative reviews, I washed the towels with 1/2 cup of baking soda before using. After drying and using the towels, there was still lots of lint all over my face. So into the washing machine they went again. This time, success with the hand towels and wash cloths. Haven't used the bath towels yet. Never again. Can only assume all those glowing reviews are the result of the little card they slip in with the shipment: review the towels, do a screenshot of the review, and they'll send free towels. Caveat emptor!
Style: Size: 6 Pieces Towel Set | Color: White

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2021
Author: Sir Lethal1ty
Title: Better Off Drying With Newspaper
Body: I‚Äôve almost never been this disappointed in the things I order on Amazon but this was the WORST. We can‚Äôt wash these with ANYTHING because they lose clumps of fabric that end up sticking to other towels/clothes. I‚Äôm not sure where it‚Äôs coming from because the towels are still there at the end if a cycle, but if you‚Äôd look at our washing machine after, you‚Äôd think they MELTED in it.But worse yet they don‚Äôt even do the job a towel is MEANT to do. I have to go through 2-3 any time I get out of the shower, I swear a cardboard box from the liquor store is more absorbent. They‚Äôre definitely soft and definitely dry quickly, but that‚Äôs easy to do when they don‚Äôt soak up much water to begin with.
Style: Size: 4 Pieces Bath Towels | Color: Navy Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 8, 2021
Author: RSR
Title: Believe the 1 star reviews - BAD SHEDDING!!
Body: I really wanted to like these towels, matched my carpet set perfectly. I should have known after the initial wash that they were trouble, washing machine full of lint, and the dryer screen needed cleaning twice while drying. First time using them, lint all over my tub, and me! I washed them separately 2 more times on the HD cycle, and tumbled dried them for an additional 60 minutes, and they were still falling apart. Like others have said, still damp 24hrs later for your next shower. Not very absorbent either. Worst towels I have ever bought. You`ve been warned!
Style: Size: 6 Pieces Towel Set | Color: Burgundy

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 10, 2021
Author: FlipFlopsForever
Title: Absorbent, but on the small side
Body: Comparing these to what I had, I would say these are on the smaller side, but they are very absorbent.  They are pretty soft, but there is some slight fading after a few washes.  I'm making a switch in my bathroom to navy blue and these look pretty good and have been working pretty well.  I added a navy blue rug which ties them together quite well.  I recommend them, but check the dimensions so you won't be surprised.  I had big fluffy towels from Kohls and these are shorter (the hand towel is actually bigger).  Overall it is a great value for 6 towels.
Style: Size: 6 Pieces Towel Set | Color: Navy Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 17, 2021
Author: Katie
Title: Not worth it. Fuzzies everywhere
Body: These towels I was so excited to get as I moved into my first apartment and wanted to do a black and red theme for the bathroom. Immediately after showering for the first time (after washing the towels and a ton of lint being in the lint trap) I had fuzzies all over me and all over the bathroom. I washed the towels a few more times and they continue to leave fuzzies everywhere 3 weeks later. It‚Äôs miserable and I decided to buy new towels since this is making me so frustrated.
Style: Size: 6 Pieces Towel Set | Color: Burgundy

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2021
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Very Disappointing
Body: For a product that says it is "hotel and spa quality" I expected a thicker towel. At $10.00 each these are overpriced and not up to the description given.The towels are decent as far as size goes, but they are no thicker than decent towels found in the big box stores for half the price.If you are used to bargain towels that barely dry and are very thin, then these are a major improvement.  If you are expecting the kind of soft and fluffy towels you find in "hotel and spa" towels, you will be disappointed.After 2 washes one of the towels started to unravel along a side seam.
Style: Size: 4 Pieces Bath Towels | Color: Black

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2021
Author: World Class Shopper
Title: Avoid
Body: These are the worst towels I have ever bought. I followed the first wash instructions to the letter and these things are still shedding though they have been washed 6 times. Huge clumps of fabric remain in the washing machine and lint in the dryer is an inch high before they are even dry. DO NOT wash anything else with these towels, you will have lint that is so thick that it takes forever to pick it off. A lint roller doesn't even help much.
Style: Size: 6 Pieces Towel Set | Color: Burgundy

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 6, 2021
Author: Jason Farrell
Title: Sheds lint like crazy even after several washings
Body: Drying yourself after a shower still leaves behind tons of fine lint on your skin, even AFTER the towels have gone through the wash half a dozen times (cold water + hang dry). This is most noticeable with the black towels we bought, but I assume all colors from this manufacturer are similarly affected with this lint problem. Dread using these towels. Maybe after a bakers dozen washings the lint will stop turning us into furry monkeys after a shower.
Style: Size: 4 Pieces Bath Towels | Color: Black

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2021
Author: Kindle Customer
Title: Nice towels but too much fuzz/lint
Body: I really want to love these towels.  The color is a rich dark gray and the detailing is great.  However, every time I use them I end up with little fuzz balls all over.  I washed them and hung them dry per the directions and then washed and dried on low before using and I've washed them 3x since and while the dryer shows a ton of lint on the screen there is still more hanging to the towels.  Maybe I just got a bad batch?
Style: Size: 4 Pieces Bath Towels | Color: Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2021
Author: Erika Levin
Title: Very Disappointed
Body: I very much liked the description of these towels and thought they would be a good value buy. Boy, was I ever wrong. I washed my new towels like one should before use to remove any chemical residue. I washed these towels as towels should be washed - deep water and hot water. When I removed them from the washer I noticed a lot of towel fuzz all over my washing machine.  As I wiped it out, it came to almost a handful. Ok, I thought, that can happen. I then put the towels into the dryer as one would on the appropriate settings for towels. I had to clean the lint trap twice during the drying cycle as it also was so full of blue towel fuzz that the dryer could have been damaged if I wasn't so vigilant. Ok, I expected that to be the end of it. But no. As I used my new towel after my bath, I had blue towel fuzz all over my body. I am extremely disappointed. I cannot return them in good conscience as I did wash them.
Style: Size: 4 Pieces Bath Towels | Color: Navy Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 20, 2021
Author: Nabeel M.
Title: Don't buy these. They will leave fuzzies all over your laundry
Body: Even after 4+ washes and dry cycles these towels still leave red fuzzies all over my clothes in really annoying places. I've pretty much given up on trying to 'break in' these towels. Not to mention you can just walk into Costco or BB&B and buy really soft and fluffy towels for not that much more, which is what I should have just done in the first place.Don't buy these. The color is nice and they're pretty normal towels, but the fuzzies are absolutely killer.
Style: Size: 4 Pieces Bath Towels | Color: Burgundy

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 19, 2021
Author: Michelle P
Title: DON'T BUY THESE!
Body: The worst towels I have ever purchased! 7 washes in the washer and 14 dry times in the dryer and still they leave thread fibers all over me and my shower and bathroom floor. What a nightmare! A HUGE waste of money because I can't even use the towels. I had to select a star otherwise there would be no star at all!In addition the wash clothes are still wringing out with black dye. The hand towels are just as bad as the towels.
Style: Size: 4 Pieces Bath Towels | Color: Black

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2021
Author: Antonio
Title: Inconsistent
Body: I bought the gray and black towels on Amazon Day.l for what I thought was a ‚Äúbargain.‚Äù Was I wrong. Here‚Äôa the review for both purchases.Gray- the stitching was falling apart in 3 of the 4 towels after the first wash. I cut off the loose strands and used. Yes, they are soft and very absorbent. No, they do not dry quickly.Black- first thing I noticed is that it was in completely different packaging but looked like the ones in the reviews. They stayed together after the first wash. They feel like cheap ‚Äúmade in China‚Äù Walmart towels. They are hard and not very absorbent. They are completely different, in feel and quality, from the gray towels.Overall, very disappointed. Inconsistent quality. Not worth the price tag, even on sale.
Style: Size: 4 Pieces Bath Towels | Color: Black

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2020
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: So Much Lint
Body: My main complaint: I washed / dried it 6 times and it still has some lint that sticks to my skin whenever I use the towel.Softness: not super soft but good enough for me. Also, sometimes super soft towels don't absorb the water well, so I prefer towels like this one.Thickness: pretty thin (like a standard hotel towel) but I don't mind that. definitely not a thick, luxurious towel if that's what you're looking for.
Style: Size: 4 Pieces Bath Towels | Color: Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2021
Author: erin swanson-cockrell
Title: VERY IMPORTANT TO READ
Body: I received my order of towels only to realize that they were used! Ewww!!! I realized this because a note from the former owner along with a bag of dryer lint was also included in the bag with the towels. I am planning on writing my own note (though I sadly do not have any dryer lint to add)  to include along with the original note when I send these back. Perhaps the next unsuspecting owner will continue with this new tradition!
Style: Size: 6 Pieces Towel Set | Color: Navy Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2021
Author: Jessica & Alex
Title: Beyond frustrated and regretful of my purchase
Body: *** Avoid these towels like the plague.*** Reading all the 1 star reviews would‚Äôve saved me $40 and a lot of frustration. I machine washed this set on cool and dried a total of 5 times now and STILL getting lint all over. Worst possible fresh-out-the-shower experience. Had to jump back in to rinse a coating of fuzzies off of myself the first time I used one. Shame because the product is very misleading, color looks great, soft to touch & *appears* absorbent BUT *****total waste of money.*****
Style: Size: 4 Pieces Bath Towels | Color: Black

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2021
Author: JAMES OWENS
Title: Thin, cheap towels
Body: These towels are thin, cheap and rough. Not at all soft or plush, like you would expect turkish cotton or 40 dollar towels to feel or look! These towels have not been used or washed and dried yet, so I can only imagine how thin and rough they will be, at that point, but will update, when they are laundered. Would NOT recommend and I dont know how it got such high reviews and rating!
Style: Size: 6 Pieces Towel Set | Color: Brown

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2021
Author: Stephen LaLonde
Title: low quality
Body: I knew to check the dryer lint screen during the dry cycle and good thing.  It needed cleaning all 4 times during the 1st drying cycle.  And, all of the stuff got on some microfiber towels that I had cleaned with them.  Another wash and dry for all and same results.  Threw everything out and went to Bed Bath and Beyond like I should have from the get go.  Just trash.
Style: Size: 4 Pieces Hand Towels | Color: Black

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2021
Author: Dave
Title: questionable good reviews
Body: the good reviews for these towels are highly questionable. Out of the box, these appear to be very soft and high quality, but they never stop shedding blue fuzzies and started fraying as soon as they were washed. Compared to other towels, they are not as absorbent. I'm looking elsewhere for towels, these are going to be cut up for cleaning rags.
Style: Size: 4 Pieces Bath Towels | Color: Navy Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 18, 2021
Author: RJ
Title: will use what I bought, but would not buy again nor recommend
Body: Price, pictures, description and reviews all looked good so purchased it. Disappointed :(I pre-washed in cold, low heat multiple times to avoid blue lint and increase absorbency but no luck. In spite of multiple wash/use cycles, blue lint everywhere and absorbency is mediocre at best. My other towels purchased locally, without any significant fanfare or research perform a lot better even after few years.
Style: Size: 6 Pieces Towel Set | Color: Navy Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2020
Author: Pink Floyd Rulz
Title: I rarely post reviews for anything-do not purchase these, useless
Body: I rarely post any review but these are one of the worst products I have purchased off Amazon. The positive ratings most be fudged. They don't absorb water. Let me repeat that. The towels do not absorb water. They are thin, poorly made and we had to return them. Honestly, these should not be sold at all. We ordered a few sets of towels from Amazon and they were all bad except one set that was just...okay. Buy towels elsewhere but these in particular are awful. Simply the worst towels you can buy. Be warned.
Style: Size: 4 Pieces Bath Towels | Color: Yellow

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 20, 2021
Author: Kathrin Landvogt
Title: Do not buy!! (Unless you want to ruin your washer/dryer)
Body: I realise these towers are inexpensive and thus I shouldn‚Äôt expect THAT much. However I don‚Äôt expect them to ruin my washer/dryer which now has to be serviced nor that after a good 8 washes (hence the washer/dryer servicing need) they still not just lose a bit of fluff like any towels would, they bleed color and there literally shreds and shreds of lint coming off them. It‚Äôs a miracle there was still any fabric left. The fluff attaches to everything in its wake and is impossible to remove, not even with super powerful vacuum or link roller.I‚Äôve never had towels of such a bad quality and needless to say I‚Äôve returned them. I was excited for them as I really liked the color but boy am I regretting ever purchasing them.
Style: Size: 6 Pieces Towel Set | Color: Burgundy

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2021
Author: Susan M. Reagan
Title: Not a True Navy Towel
Body: I bought these towels as I was looking for a Navy colored towel to provide more contrast after painting my bathroom.  The towel is nice and happens to be a larger size than many hand towels on the market.  I just was a bit disappointed in the color.  I would not describe it as a true navy.  The navy color I received is more like a dark royal.  Pretty but not as dark as what I was expecting.  I am keeping them as they are a very good buy.  Will probably look again but in person when I can see the true color rather than online
Style: Size: 4 Pieces Hand Towels | Color: Navy Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2020
Author: Happy in Texas
Title: Not as thick as expected
Body: I was hoping for more thickness.  I just received these towels and cannot argue with the price.  Also, some towel sets give 2 wash cloths and 2 hand towels for each of the bath towels.  This set gives only 1 of each.  I didn't think of that before placing the order.  One would be better off not just looking for the price and description that Amazon gives, but really look at everything.
Style: Size: 6 Pieces Towel Set | Color: Brown

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2021
Author: Maya
Title: So much lint
Body: These towels are a nice rich color. They did fade a bit after I washed them. Biggest problem is they have so much lint! I ordered the burgundy color and now I‚Äôm picking lint up everywhere. Bathroom counter tops, bathroom carpets, and even my face after I wash and dry it. I thought I was bleeding one night but no it was towel lint!
Style: Size: 4 Pieces Bath Towels | Color: Burgundy

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2021
Author: FJ-in-Texas

Style: Size: 4 Pieces Hand Towels | Color: Burgundy

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2021
Author: Kathy
Title: MAJOR SHEDDING
Body: Edit: well after removing a entire squirrel worth of lint from my dryer and washing these 3 times. They are actually not to bad. Not as soft but still pretty good 3 stars if you wanna put the work in.Original:I don‚Äôt write reviews that often.  But like god damn it. I washed these and then dried off and I am COVERED head to toe in lint that is shedding from these towels. I‚Äôll wash them again cause yes while they are soft ima need to shower and again and get rid of all this lint. This product is a DO NOT BUY from me.Absorption is average.Softness is goodSHEDDING = HORRID.gunna probably have to wash these like 5 times to get it to maybe stop. Might just go replace them tbh.

Pieces of it got over all the other different towels I had in wash. DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY ON THIS PRODUCT.  So sorry I got it.  It was hard to get the pieces off of my other towels.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2020
Author: Russell P. Titmas
Title: Thin and non absorbent.
Body: STOP!  don‚Äôt buy before reading this:  These towels look very nice.  Color is good. But they are only for decoration.  They are thin and they do not absorb water.  You cannot get dry using them.  The instructions said to wash and they would get more absorbent.  Not really.  We have washed them twice and they are still not good to dry with when you get out of the shower.I would not recommend buying them.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2020
Author: Meep
Title: Nice Towels!
Body: These are super soft and absorbent- no real complaints. They have been rather linty, but I expect that with any new towel- not sure how other reviewers got non-linty towels. Either way, nice towels, I especially like the loop for hanging.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2021
Author: Alice
Title: worst towels I ever bought
Body: got the towels and they had a funky smell. So I washed them before use, as instructed. When I got them out of the dryer, there was more lint in the trap than I have EVER seen from a load of wash. I couldn't even get the lint trap out correctly there was so much. And then when I looked at the towels, they are already falling apart at the seams. They are fraying and also snagged. They look like towels I have used for years. What the heck? Please refund my purchase and I will never buy these towels again.
Style: Size: 6 Pieces Towel Set | Color: Grey

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2020
Author: Lynette Meier
Title: Not real impressed
Body: The washclothes are amazingly thick, but the bath towels are not as impressive. The green ones got bleach-like stains the very first time I used them and I am very careful about cleaning products, toothpaste, etc. Disappointed as that was the entire reason for buying new towel sets. The dark blue ones appear to be fine for now. Unfortunately I washed them all first as recommended so I'm unable to return them.
Style: Size: 6 Pieces Towel Set | Color: Navy Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 5, 2021
Author: Marsha Hanchrow
Title: The towels that never stop giving
Body: My first set was missing a hand towel, but Amazon corrected that. The continuing negative - these things shed.I washed them by themselves before use, knowing they would bleed and shed some manufacturing fuzz. I had a delicates bag in that load, and picked navy blue fuzz-balls off a fluffy black cashmere vest for an hour after I pulled it out of the washer.The photograph shows the collection from my dryer's lint screen after the 3rd washing. They can't stay thick and soft if they continue to give up so much.
Style: Size: 6 Pieces Towel Set | Color: Navy Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 15, 2021
Author: Amazon Client
Title: They are ecological friendly-will decompose in a month

It shed so much the dryer got hot because the filter that was clean when the towel went in was completely full of lint both times and started to shred in the centers. Author: T Customer
Title: Killer Diller Turkish Towels!
Body: This set of four full-sized towels met and exceeded all of my expectations. I followed the recommended 12 hr soak in plain water before washing them separately for the first time. Sure enough all those loosened tips of twisted threads let off a healthy wad of lint in the dryer just as I was warned they would which made it much less than shocking when it happened. The result was a plush and absorbent field of soft cotton tufts which left nothing but clean skin behind. I figure each towel will be good for ten showers at least but I'll be very interested in tracking real-life results including the amount of lint in the second and third washes.
Style: Size: 4 Pieces Bath Towels | Color: Navy Blue

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2020
Author: Alric the Red
Title: Total disappointment
Body: I ordered these towels because of good reviews.  My father-in-law ordered a set of towels from a different brand, and I really liked it and it was $10 cheaper than this one.  I chose this because I thought I was going to be even better than his but I was very disappointed.  These towels were so thin, like the $3 towels you get from Walmart. I was gonna return it but there was an instruction saying it will fluff up after washing for the first time before use. I did that thinking it would get thicker. It didn't! Now I can't return it since I opened and washed it. The people who gave this higher ratings probably have lower standards. I'm sorry.  Did not like this purchase at all!  I hope this helps coz I normally don't write reviews.
Style: Size: 4 Pieces Hand Towels | Color: Grey
